products.title: Konya Blackout Putty Beige
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Putty Beige Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Putty Beige Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Luxari PVC Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Luxari PVC Blackout Beige Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £15.13 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luxari PVC Blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1511 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Marlow Sand (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Marlow Sand (Blackout) Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
